name: Cyber Glider (Beta for Android)
description:
Hey there!

What's Cyber Glider?

Cyber Glider is an endless runner, a bit like Subway Surfers; but with a twist: instead of controlling the runner directly, you control the environment to build a path for the runner.
This will be the very first game by Powerline Studio. This game is still in development, but at a fairly late stage.

How to play
  • The runner at the bottom of the screen is constantly running forward. You have to prevent him from falling down by dragging platforms in front of him.
  • There are regular platforms, some are locked and immovable (red border)
  • Some will shift the runner to the left or right (arrows)
  • Portal platforms teleport the runner to another portal
  • Wind (white arrows/triangles) will push you to the side. Be cautious there!

Try to get the highest score and comment it bellow!

⬇️Feedback here!⬇️

If you want to be extra helpful (or want to get a free background for the main game when it is released), you can fill out this form:

→ https://forms.gle/39Lpc7JJS7LY2XZa8 ←

This way it's a lot easier for us to evaluate. Thank you very much!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Some bonus gameplay tips
  • Stars and portals grant bonus score points
  • The wider you jump forward with a portal, the more score points you get
  • You don't need a platform beneath the wind, it will carry the runner regardless
  • Wind will always have priority if there's another type of platform beneath it
